properties.body:
EASTERN CARIBBEAN SEA.
SAINT LUCIA.
DNC 14.
M/V, GREY HULL, TWO PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED
AND ADRIFT IN VICINITY 13-34.50N 061-13.00W AT
142000Z APR. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP
A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
MRCC FORT DE FRANCE, INMARSAT: 422799024,
TELEX: 42912008, PHONE: 5965 9670 9292,
FAX: 5965 9663 2450, E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
